Name: Key
Text: For every key there is a matching lock, now just need to find it

Name: Ring
Text: This ring looks important, there must be more to it than meets the eye

Name: Crossbow
Text: This bad boy has gotten you out of darker darks in the past

Name: Holy water
Text: Heals the wounded, Melts the evil

Name: Holy Cross
Text: Jesus died on one of those, so i guess this is cool

Name: Flammable Oil
Text: If all else fails, set it on fire

Name: Crossbow Bolts
Text: These things are expensive, but the church is very wealthy. Use them
